sqlList.sql: select lp.prop AS HVPID, fh.SUP_HOTEL_ID AS ELID, fh.source AS SORC, fh.in_use ,lp.prop_name_zh AS HOTELNM,fh.source AS SUPID, case when fh.source IS NOT NULL AND fh.source='ELONG' then '艺龙' when fh.source IS NOT NULL AND fh.source='PODINNS' then '布丁' when fh.source IS NOT NULL AND fh.source='CTRIP' then '携程' when fh.source IS NOT NULL AND fh.source='MOTEL168' then '莫泰168' when fh.source IS NOT NULL AND fh.source='HOMEINNS' then '如家' when fh.source IS NOT NULL AND fh.source='HUBS1' then 'HUBS1' else '天海路' end AS SUPNM from t_lm_b_prop lp left join t_sup_map_hotel fh on fh.APP_hotel_id=lp.prop where (:HVPID IS NULL OR lp.prop=:HVPID) AND (:HVPLP IS NULL OR (:HVPLP='0' AND (fh.APP_hotel_id IS NULL OR fh.APP_hotel_id='')) OR (:HVPLP='1' AND (fh.APP_hotel_id IS NOT NULL OR fh.APP_hotel_id <> ''))) order by lp.prop desc

select st.HVPID, st.HOTELNM, Case when st.SHC > 0 then '../../Styles/images/tick.png' else '../../Styles/images/cross.png' end AS HBIMG, Case when st.RCC > 0 and st.RCC=st.ARI then '../../Styles/images/star.png' else '../../Styles/images/hstar.png' end AS RBIMG, Case when st.SHC > 0 then '该酒店已绑定供应商' else '该酒店未绑定供应商' end AS HBMSG, Case when st.RCC > 0 and st.RCC=st.ARI then '所有房型均已绑定供应商' else '部分房型未绑定供应商' end AS RBMSG from (select lp.prop AS HVPID, lp.prop_name_zh AS HOTELNM, NVL(fh.SHC, 0) AS SHC,count(trm.room_code) AS RCC,count(app_room_id) AS ARI from t_lm_b_prop lp left join (select APP_hotel_id, count(sup_hotel_id) AS SHC from t_sup_map_hotel where (:HVPID IS NULL OR APP_hotel_id=:HVPID) group by APP_hotel_id) fh on fh.APP_hotel_id=lp.prop left join (select distinct trd.room_code, trd.hotel_id, trd.status from t_room trd inner join t_price_code_room pcr on trd.hotel_id = pcr.hotel_id and pcr.room_code=trd.room_code and pcr.status='1' and pcr.price_code IN ('LMBAR','LMBAR2')) trm on trm.hotel_id=lp.prop and trm.status='1' left join (select distinct smr.app_room_id, smr.app_hotel_id from t_sup_map_room smr inner join t_price_code_room pcr on smr.app_hotel_id = pcr.hotel_id and pcr.room_code=smr.app_room_id and pcr.status='1' and pcr.price_code IN ('LMBAR','LMBAR2') where smr.SUP_ROOM_ID IS NOT NULL group by smr.app_room_id, smr.app_hotel_id) fr on fr.app_room_id=trm.room_code and fr.app_hotel_id=trm.hotel_id where (:HVPID IS NULL OR lp.prop=:HVPID) AND (:HVPLP IS NULL OR (:HVPLP='0' AND (fh.APP_hotel_id IS NULL OR fh.APP_hotel_id='')) OR (:HVPLP='1' AND (fh.APP_hotel_id IS NOT NULL OR fh.APP_hotel_id <> ''))) group by lp.prop, lp.prop_name_zh,fh.SHC order by lp.prop desc ) st left join t_lm_sales_history tlsh on st.HVPID=tlsh.hotel_id and tlsh.status='1' where (:HVPRP IS NULL OR (:HVPRP='0' AND (st.RCC > 0 and st.ARI > 0 and st.RCC<>st.ARI)) OR (:HVPRP='1' AND (st.RCC > 0 and st.RCC=st.ARI)) OR (:HVPRP='2' AND (st.RCC = 0 or st.ARI = 0))) AND ((:SALES IS NULL) OR (NLS_LOWER(tlsh.sales_account) = NLS_LOWER(:SALES)))

select count(st.HVPID) from (select lp.prop AS HVPID, lp.prop_name_zh AS HOTELNM, NVL(fh.SHC, 0) AS SHC,count(trm.room_code) AS RCC,count(app_room_id) AS ARI from t_lm_b_prop lp left join (select APP_hotel_id, count(sup_hotel_id) AS SHC from t_sup_map_hotel where (:HVPID IS NULL OR APP_hotel_id=:HVPID) group by APP_hotel_id) fh on fh.APP_hotel_id=lp.prop left join (select distinct trd.room_code, trd.hotel_id, trd.status from t_room trd inner join t_price_code_room pcr on trd.hotel_id = pcr.hotel_id and pcr.room_code=trd.room_code and pcr.status='1' and pcr.price_code IN ('LMBAR','LMBAR2')) trm on trm.hotel_id=lp.prop and trm.status='1' left join (select distinct smr.app_room_id, smr.app_hotel_id from t_sup_map_room smr inner join t_price_code_room pcr on smr.app_hotel_id = pcr.hotel_id and pcr.room_code=smr.app_room_id and pcr.status='1' and pcr.price_code IN ('LMBAR','LMBAR2') where smr.SUP_ROOM_ID IS NOT NULL group by smr.app_room_id, smr.app_hotel_id) fr on fr.app_room_id=trm.room_code and fr.app_hotel_id=trm.hotel_id where (:HVPID IS NULL OR lp.prop=:HVPID) AND (:HVPLP IS NULL OR (:HVPLP='0' AND (fh.APP_hotel_id IS NULL OR fh.APP_hotel_id='')) OR (:HVPLP='1' AND (fh.APP_hotel_id IS NOT NULL OR fh.APP_hotel_id <> ''))) group by lp.prop, lp.prop_name_zh,fh.SHC order by lp.prop desc ) st left join t_lm_sales_history tlsh on st.HVPID=tlsh.hotel_id and tlsh.status='1' where (:HVPRP IS NULL OR (:HVPRP='0' AND (st.RCC > 0 and st.ARI > 0 and st.RCC<>st.ARI)) OR (:HVPRP='1' AND (st.RCC > 0 and st.RCC=st.ARI)) OR (:HVPRP='2' AND (st.RCC = 0 or st.ARI = 0))) AND ((:SALES IS NULL) OR (NLS_LOWER(tlsh.sales_account) = NLS_LOWER(:SALES)))

select count(lp.prop) from t_lm_b_prop lp left join t_sup_map_hotel fh on fh.APP_hotel_id=lp.prop where (:HVPID IS NULL OR lp.prop=:HVPID) AND (:HVPLP IS NULL OR (:HVPLP='0' AND (fh.APP_hotel_id IS NULL OR fh.APP_hotel_id='')) OR (:HVPLP='1' AND (fh.APP_hotel_id IS NOT NULL OR fh.APP_hotel_id <> '')))

merge into t_sup_map_hotel t1 using (select :HVPID AS APP_HOTEL_ID,:ELID AS SUP_HOTEL_ID, :SOURCE AS SOURCE, :OSOURCE AS OSOURCE from dual) t2 on (t1.APP_HOTEL_ID = t2.APP_HOTEL_ID AND ((t2.OSOURCE IS NULL AND t1.SOURCE IS NULL) OR (t1.SOURCE = t2.OSOURCE))) when matched then update set t1.SUP_HOTEL_ID=t2.SUP_HOTEL_ID, t1.SOURCE = t2.SOURCE, t1.UPDATE_TIME=sysdate where t1.APP_HOTEL_ID = t2.APP_HOTEL_ID AND t1.SOURCE = t2.OSOURCE when not matched then insert values (t2.APP_HOTEL_ID,t2.SUP_HOTEL_ID,t2.SOURCE, '1', sysdate, sysdate)
update T_SUP_MAP_ROOM set IN_USE='0', UPDATE_TIME=sysdate where APP_HOTEL_ID=:HVPID and SOURCE=:OSOURCE and SUP_HOTEL_ID=:SUPID

merge into t_sup_map_hotel t1 using (select :HVPID AS APP_HOTEL_ID,:SUPID AS SUP_HOTEL_ID, :SOURCE AS SOURCE, :OSOURCE AS OSOURCE, :INUSE AS INUSE from dual) t2 on (t1.APP_HOTEL_ID = t2.APP_HOTEL_ID AND ((t2.OSOURCE IS NULL AND t1.SOURCE IS NULL) OR (t1.SOURCE = t2.OSOURCE))) when matched then update set t1.SUP_HOTEL_ID=t2.SUP_HOTEL_ID, t1.SOURCE = t2.SOURCE, t1.UPDATE_TIME=sysdate, t1.IN_USE=t2.INUSE where t1.APP_HOTEL_ID = t2.APP_HOTEL_ID AND t1.SOURCE = t2.OSOURCE when not matched then insert values (t2.APP_HOTEL_ID,t2.SUP_HOTEL_ID,t2.SOURCE, t2.INUSE, sysdate, sysdate)
insert into t_sup_map_hotel (app_hotel_id, sup_hotel_id, source, in_use, create_time, update_time) values (:HVPID, :SUPID, :SOURCE, :INUSE, sysdate, sysdate)

insert into t_fx_hvp_area(id,hvp_hotel_id,FX_HOTEL_ID,source,area_id) select t_fx_hvp_area_seq.nextval as ID, :HVPHOTELID AS HVP_HOTEL_ID,SUP_HOTEL_ID,SOURCE,:AREAID AS AREAID from t_sup_map_hotel where app_HOTEL_ID=:HVPHOTELID
delete t_fx_hvp_area where HVP_HOTEL_ID=:HVPHOTELID
select * from t_sup_map_hotel where APP_HOTEL_ID=:HVPHOTELID

select t.id as AREAID,t.tag_name as TagName from t_fx_hvp_area a,t_tag_info t where a.area_id=t.id AND ((:HVPHOTELID IS NULL) OR (hvp_hotel_id LIKE '%'||:HVPHOTELID||'%')) AND ((:CITYNAME IS NULL) OR (NLS_LOWER(CITY_ID) LIKE '%'||:CITYNAME||'%'))
insert into t_fx_hvp_area(id,hvp_hotel_id,FX_HOTEL_ID,source,area_id) values(t_fx_hvp_area_seq.nextval,:HVPHOTELID,'','HVP',:AREAID)

select '供应商：' AS SORC, '供应商ID：' AS SORCID , '状态：' AS INUSERT, case when in_use IS NOT NULL AND in_use='1' then '上线' else '下线' end AS INUSERDIS, in_use AS INUSE,sup_hotel_id AS SUPID,source AS SOURCES, case when source IS NOT NULL AND source='ELONG' then '艺龙' when source IS NOT NULL AND source='PODINNS' then '布丁' when source IS NOT NULL AND source='CTRIP' then '携程' when source IS NOT NULL AND source='MOTEL168' then '莫泰168' when source IS NOT NULL AND source='HOMEINNS' then '如家' when source IS NOT NULL AND source='HUBS1' then 'HUBS1' else '天海路' end AS SUPNM,'0' AS RTYPE,RowID AS OSUPID from t_sup_map_hotel where app_hotel_id=:HVPID

select sup_hotel_id AS SUPID,source AS SOURCES, case when source IS NOT NULL AND source='ELONG' then '艺龙' when source IS NOT NULL AND source='PODINNS' then '布丁' when source IS NOT NULL AND source='CTRIP' then '携程' when source IS NOT NULL AND source='MOTEL168' then '莫泰168' when source IS NOT NULL AND source='HOMEINNS' then '如家' when source IS NOT NULL AND source='HUBS1' then 'HUBS1' else '天海路' end AS SUPNM from t_sup_map_hotel where app_hotel_id=:HVPID order by sup_hotel_id

select distinct '['||trm.room_code||']'||trm.room_name AS ROOMNM,trm.room_code,trm.room_name,nvl(CSRI,0) AS CSR, tt.two_price AS TWOPRICE from ( select tr.room_code,tr.room_name,tr.hotel_id from t_room tr inner join t_price_code_room pcr on pcr.hotel_id = tr.hotel_id and pcr.room_code=tr.room_code and pcr.status='1' and pcr.price_code IN ('LMBAR','LMBAR2') where tr.hotel_id=:HVPID and tr.status='1' ) trm left join (select smr.app_room_id, smr.app_hotel_id, count(smr.sup_room_id) CSRI from t_sup_map_room smr inner join t_price_code_room pcr on pcr.hotel_id = smr.app_hotel_id and pcr.room_code=smr.app_room_id and pcr.status='1' and pcr.price_code IN ('LMBAR','LMBAR2') where smr.SUP_ROOM_ID IS NOT NULL and smr.app_hotel_id=:HVPID group by smr.app_room_id, smr.app_hotel_id) fr on fr.app_room_id=trm.room_code and fr.app_hotel_id=trm.hotel_id left join ( select tlp.room_type_code,tlp.two_price from (select id,room_type_code,two_price from t_lm_plan where hotel_id=:HVPID and effect_date >= trunc(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'dd') and effect_date <= trunc(sysdate, 'dd') ) tlp inner join ( select max(id) as MID,room_type_code from t_lm_plan where hotel_id= :HVPID and effect_date >= trunc(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'dd') and effect_date <= trunc(sysdate, 'dd') group by room_type_code ) dt on tlp.id = dt.MID ) tt on trm.room_code = tt.room_type_code order by room_code

select distinct fr.sup_room_id AS SUPID, fr.source AS SOURCES, case when fr.source IS NOT NULL AND fr.source='ELONG' then '艺龙' when fr.source IS NOT NULL AND fr.source='PODINNS' then '布丁' when fr.source IS NOT NULL AND fr.source='CTRIP' then '携程' when fr.source IS NOT NULL AND fr.source='MOTEL168' then '莫泰168' when fr.source IS NOT NULL AND fr.source='HOMEINNS' then '如家' when fr.source IS NOT NULL AND fr.source='HUBS1' then 'HUBS1' else '天海路' end AS SUPNM, case when fr.in_use IS NOT NULL AND fr.in_use='1' then '上线' else '下线' end AS INUSERDIS, fr.in_use AS INUSE, fr.sup_hotel_id||'_'||fr.sup_room_id||'_'||smr.sup_plan_id AS SUPHID, fr.source AS OSOURCES, '0' AS RTYPE, fr.rowid AS OROWID from t_sup_map_room fr left join t_sup_map_roomplan smr on fr.app_room_id=smr.app_room_id and fr.sup_room_id=smr.sup_room_id and fr.source = smr.source and fr.app_hotel_id = smr.app_hotel_id and fr.sup_hotel_id=smr.sup_hotel_id and smr.IN_USE='1' inner join t_price_code_room pcr on fr.app_hotel_id = pcr.hotel_id and pcr.room_code=fr.app_room_id and pcr.status='1' and pcr.price_code IN ('LMBAR','LMBAR2') where fr.app_hotel_id=:HVPID and fr.app_room_id=:RoomCD order by fr.sup_room_id

insert into t_sup_map_room (app_room_id, sup_room_id, source, in_use, create_time, update_time, app_hotel_id, sup_hotel_id) values (:APPROOM, :SUPROOM, :SOURCE, :INUSE, sysdate, sysdate, :APPHOTELID, :SUPHOTELID)

insert into t_sup_map_roomplan (app_room_id, sup_room_id, source, in_use, create_time, update_time, app_hotel_id, sup_hotel_id,sup_plan_id) values (:APPROOM, :SUPROOM, :SOURCE, :INUSE, sysdate, sysdate, :APPHOTELID, :SUPHOTELID, :SUPPLANID)

update t_sup_map_room set sup_room_id = :SUPROOM,source=:SOURCE,in_use=:INUSE,update_time=sysdate,sup_hotel_id=:SUPHOTELID where app_hotel_id=:APPHOTELID and app_room_id=:APPROOM and source=:OSOURCE and sup_room_id = :OSUPROOM AND sup_hotel_id=:OSUPHOTELID

update t_sup_map_roomplan set sup_room_id = :SUPROOM,source=:SOURCE,in_use=:INUSE,update_time=sysdate,sup_hotel_id=:SUPHOTELID,sup_plan_id=:SUPPLANID where app_hotel_id=:APPHOTELID and app_room_id=:APPROOM and source=:OSOURCE and sup_room_id = :OSUPROOM AND sup_hotel_id=:OSUPHOTELID
select t.app_hotel_id,t.sup_hotel_id from t_sup_map_hotel t where t.app_hotel_id=:HVPID and t.source=:SOURCE
select t.app_hotel_id,t.sup_hotel_id from t_sup_map_hotel t where t.app_hotel_id=:HVPID and t.source=:SOURCE and t.Rowid<>:OSUPID
select app_room_id, sup_room_id, source, app_hotel_id, sup_hotel_id from t_sup_map_room where app_room_id=:APPROOM and source=:SOURCE and app_hotel_id=:APPHOTELID
select app_room_id, sup_room_id, source, app_hotel_id, sup_hotel_id from t_sup_map_room where app_room_id=:APPROOM and source=:SOURCE and app_hotel_id=:APPHOTELID AND Rowid<>:OROWID
